scripts.pack: rm -rf dist && npm run build && node scripts/version.js $npm_package_version && echo 'Zipping files...' && cd dist && zip -r wikigame-v$npm_package_version.zip *
scripts.init-pre-commit:
echo '#!/bin/sh
echo "Running pre-commit scripts..."
cd ./extension && npm run pre-commit' > `git rev-parse --show-toplevel`/.git/hooks/pre-commit
scripts.pre-commit: npm run pack && cd .. && git add extension/dist/
